long_description: Lighter than its predecessor, this 3-season Therm-a-Rest ProLite women's sleeping pad is 1 of the lightest, most compact, self-inflating mattress in the Therm-a-Rest Fast & Light line. Designed specifically for women, this pad features extra insulation in the torso and foot areas to keep even the coldest sleepers warm and comfortable. Pad is engineered for alpine climbing, adventure racing and long-distance backpacking when reducing weight and volume are of paramount importance. Tapered shape reduces weight and bulkiness. ProLite Plus is engineered with innovative diagonal die-cut foam to reduce heat loss and provide efficient insulation. Stuff sack included.
short_description: Lighter than its predecessor, this 3-season Therm-a-Rest ProLite women's sleeping pad is 1 of the lightest, most compact, self-inflating mattress in the Therm-a-Rest Fast & Light line.
